Package hr

Interface IDriver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPerson
    public interface IDriver
extends IPerson

    Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
    Politécnico do Porto (PP)
    Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
    Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
    Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
    2019 / 2020

    Represents the Driver behaviour. Default status must be free

    Authors:

    • @author Ricardo Santos

      • addLicense

        boolean addLicense​(LicenseType licenseType)
            throws HRException
        Adds a licence to the driver
        Parameters:
        licenseType - to be added
        Returns:
        true if inserted, false otherwise
        Throws:
        HRException - if
        1. licenseType is null
        2. the (@link DriverStatus status} is different from free

        Parameters:
        licenseType - to be removed
        Returns:
        true if removed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        HRException - if
        1. licenseType is null
        2. the (@link DriverStatus status} is different from free
